title: Medbourne Primary School
creator_credit: Henry Felt and Education Development Center
brief_description: Focuses mainly on the seven to eleven year-olds and the teachers in a rural school in which the total enrolment is forty-eight. Shot over a period of five days, the film shows the continual activity. Some children are painting, others are using their printing press, while others are cooking a chicken outside.
